name: IOC-SwiftDraw Pro
description: IOC-SwiftDraw Pro is a lightning-fast, privacy-first Chrome extension built for security analysts, threat hunters, and OSINT researchers who need to pivot on Indicators of Compromise instantly—without ever leaving the browser. With a single right-click, query specialized services across IPs, domains, hashes, URLs, emails, sandbox artifacts, ASNs and more, one at a time or all at once via fully customizable SwiftDraw Pro loadouts. It features built-in defang/refang logic, dynamic category-based context menus, role-based profiles, and Chrome Storage sync—delivering uncompromised speed, total flexibility, and zero telemetry for modern digital investigations.
